name: Origami Bird Clash
description: Lookie here! An invitation to play Origami Bird Clash on its official launch? This scene feels a bit familiar, but the sender this time is the IPC instead.
introduction:
◆ Introduction ◆
Origami Bird Clash is a collectible arcade battle game jointly developed by The Family and the IPC, featuring a simple Match-Three gameplay to bring you the purest enjoyment.

◆ Event Rules ◆
● In the Origami Bird Clash event, Qingque, cursed by the Ghost Bird, will duel other opponents in the arcade game with the help of the Trailblazer while searching for ways to reverse the curse. 
● In the Story Mode, whenever Qingque prevails over a new opponent, she will gain Reputation. As her Reputation Rank increases, more functions will be unlocked.
● After reaching Reputation Rank 3, the Multiplayer Mode will be unlocked, where the Trailblazer will be able to participate in a Duo Duel or Battle Royale with Trailblazers of other worlds to raise ranks.

◆ Permanent Rewards ◆
● Complete a certain number of challenge goals in stages to claim duel rewards.

◆ Limited-time Rewards ◆
● During the limited-time event, completing specified missions will earn you corresponding rewards.

◆ Event Reminders ◆
● After the Origami Bird Clash limited-time event ends, Trailblazers will no longer be able to obtain the limited-time rewards, but they can still visit the {TEXTJOIN#87} map to speak with Lena, experience the event, and obtain permanent rewards.
